How We Talk
About Others

Decoding linguistic Patterns within Social Networks of Reddit Communities
Start Exploring Reddit's Galaxy
Phase 0: General Analysis

Take a Look at Reddit‚Äôs Galaxy

Welcome to the Galaxy of Reddit. In this vast digital expanse, every planet is called a Subreddit pooling together likeminded thinkers from across the galaxy. These planets do not exist in isolation. They are socially connected through their inhabitants, called users constantly debating. These users are complete information haulers, during theyr visits to other planets they send reports to theyr current home planet mentioning things that caught theyr attention. And these reports can be quite emotional having positive/neutral or negative outlook on things. In other words having different sentiment. This inborn behaviour alows information flow across the galaxy and socialy links planets closer togehter. We, the geeky inhabitants of planet EPFL, are fascinated by these referential migration patterns and want to understand how information spreads through this galaxy. To observe them, we calibrated our instruments to spy on these traveling user reports. (This involves no privacy breach. In this universe, all reports are anonymous unless users deliberately reveal their identities).

Our initial scan revealed two distinct styles of user reports. Some users are careful, embedding the planets names deep within the body of their report. Others are careless, broadcasting the planet they are talking about in the title for all to see. Since tracking all the reports is over our limits, we called for help from a scholarly planet known as Stanford, which provided historical Galaxy report records from 2014 to 2017 from what they call the Reddit Hyperlink Network program. Using analytical tools granted by the galaxy‚Äôs overseers, ADA, we explored these traveling reports and uncovered unexpected and sometimes unsettling information pathways.

This is the story of how we became the Variance Vanguards of the subreddit galaxy.

To keep both explorers and scientists satisfied, we switch to precise terminology for the analysis that follows, returning to the narrative when interpreting what we observe in cursive.

An Expanding Reddit Universe

Over a 2.5-year period Reddit Hyperlink Network dataset tracks we managed to observe approximately 860 000 mentions, with title citations taking two thirds of total links totaling 572 000 across 54 075 unique subredits. In this 2.5-year period weekly posts mentioning other subredits grew in a steady pace with growth following a strong linear trend (R2 = 0.87) (Figure 0.1), most of the observed growth being positive or neutral sentiment mentions. With positive/neutral sentiment outnumbering the negative by 8.35 to 1. Furthermore, linear regression reveals a substantially steeper growth rate for positive and neutral mentions (slope = 2.39) than for negative mentions (slope = 0.24) (Figure 0.2).

That‚Äôs a nice universe expansion metric! The Reddit universe is growing faster than its negativity.

Figure 0.1 - The Expansion of the Reddit Galaxy: Linear Growth ($R^2 = 0.87$).
Figure 0.2 -

Connectivity across Reddit is highly uneven and does not reach all nodes. Most subreddits belong to one large weakly connected cluster of 65 648 nodes, while 711 smaller clusters remain isolated from the main graph. However, strong connectivity is much more limited. Only 21 432 nodes form a single strongly connected cluster, leaving 45 563 nodes weakly attached through mostly one-way connections.

After a short warm-up with the data, reality sets in. This universe is big and not complitely wired. A few crowded planets constantly receive reports about each other, while many others gets explored less. Large parts of the galaxy are not talked about.

Maybe they are boring?

Chasing every quiet corner would stretch our efforts thin. So we do the sensible thing, we focus on the largest social hub, where reports reach all the planets at least once. If there is a coherent story about how Reddit talks about itself, this is where it should speak the loudest.

We must hurry, the universe is expanding, and we need to make sense of it before it outgrows us.

Fun Fact: The Reddit Galaxy is a cohesive, rapidly expanding system where positive interactions act as the primary engine of growth, binding 97% of communities into a single "Super-cluster."

Mapping the Galaxy: From Content Islands to Gravitational Clusters

Based on community social attributes, what distinct communication patterns can we define?

At the early stage of exploring Reddit as a large-scale data galaxy, we initially wanted to perform a clustering on subreddits based on embeddings on user overlap, assuming that if two ‚Äúplanets‚Äù (subreddits) shared a substantial number of active users, they should naturally appear close to each other on the social map. This assumption, however, quickly revealed two critical technical limitations.

  • Structural Isolation: User overlap reflects shared interests rather than actual interaction. Many communities share a large user base yet rarely engage with one another structurally, which artificially pulls together what are effectively parallel worlds.
  • Sparsity & Incompleteness: This embedding approach covers only a subset of communities, leaving large portions of the ecosystem unmapped.

This realization led us to shift focus from surface-level content similarity to a deeper structural layer: the hyperlink-based interaction network. Each mention in a link represents a concrete point of contact between communities. By modeling these links, we wish to construct an inter-community network and identified clusters within it. Each cluster is treated as a ‚Äústar cluster‚Äù: a group of communities with closely aligned norms, topics, and interaction patterns.

Algorithmic Competition: Identifying the Optimal Gravitational Field

To partition tens of thousands of communities into coherent and analytically meaningful structures, we subjected three widely used community detection algorithms to a systematic stress test. Rather than relying on a single metric, we evaluated their performance through three complementary, physically inspired indicators that capture different aspects of structural quality within the Reddit galaxy.

  • üî∏ Modularity: Measures how tightly interactions are concentrated within clusters, reflecting the strength of internal gravitational binding.
  • üî∏ Conductance: Captures how much interaction ‚Äúleaks‚Äù across cluster boundaries; lower values indicate sharper, more stable borders between star systems.
  • üî∏ Coverage: Indicates the proportion of total interactions in the galaxy that are captured by the detected clusters.
Method Number of Clusters Coverage Average Conductance Modularity
Leiden 85 0.634 0.198 0.415
Infomap 3181 0.565 0.518 0.466
FastGreedy 100 0.725 0.206 0.519

While FastGreedy achieves the highest modularity score, its optimization favors dense internal grouping at the cost of slightly higher boundary leakage. Infomap, in contrast, fragments the galaxy into over three thousand micro-clusters, producing a structure that is overly granular and difficult to interpret at a systemic level.

The Leiden algorithm offers the most balanced results. With the lowest average conductance (0.198), it identifies 85 well-formed clusters that are both cohesive and interpretable, while maintaining adequate coverage of overall interactions. This balance between internal coherence and boundary clarity makes Leiden the most suitable foundation for modeling the large-scale social structure of the Reddit galaxy. Accordingly, we adopt Leiden as the baseline algorithm for defining cluster-level dynamics in all subsequent analyses.

Fig. 0.1 ‚Äì Global view of the Reddit galaxy: social star clusters identified using the Leiden algorithm.

A Two-Stage Classification of Social Distance

Once this structural map was established, a new challenge emerged: how can we precisely describe ‚Äúsocial distance‚Äù between communities? A simple distinction between ‚Äúwithin-cluster‚Äù and ‚Äúcross-cluster‚Äù interactions is too coarse. It cannot explain why some cross-cluster exchanges remain measured and cooperative, while others escalate rapidly.

To address this, we designed a two-stage classification framework that separates interactions along two independent dimensions: the status of the source community and the intensity of the connection.

  • Stage 1: Intra-cluster role differentiation
    Based on centrality within each star cluster, communities are classified as Core(Top 30% active) or Periphery(The rest 70%). This distinction captures whether a signal originates from a dominant, well-established position or from a more marginal one.
  • Stage 2: Cross-cluster link strength
    For cross-cluster interactions, we compute the median interaction strength and apply a balanced 50/50 split. Links above the median are classified as Strong, representing stable and recurring cross-cluster ties; those below the median are labeled Weak, reflecting infrequent or incidental contact.
Fig. 1.2 ‚Äì Distribution of interaction types across 850,000 observed links.
508,841 links (59.3%)
Intra-Core

The dense center of the galaxy. Most interactions occur within culturally unified core regions, where communication is high-bandwidth and high-trust. These links form the backbone of everyday social order.

155,383 links (18.1%)
Cross-Weak

Low-frequency cross-cluster encounters. These links often lack shared context and are more prone to misunderstanding or misalignment.

149,144 links (17.4%)
Cross-Strong

Stable and recurring cross-cluster connections. These links support sustained interaction across cultural boundaries and play a key role in maintaining inter-cluster order.

44,155 links (5.2%)
Intra-Periphery

Sparse interactions among peripheral communities within the same cluster. Notably, cross-cluster interaction is more common than communication among peripheral neighbors.

This ‚Äúgalactic census‚Äù shows that Reddit is far from a flat or uniform space. Social gravity organizes it into a system anchored by dense cores and connected by cross-cluster bridges. This structural baseline motivates our next question: does a community‚Äôs position in the galaxy fundamentally shape how it speaks?

Research Question 02

How do the social attributes of communication links determine baseline linguistic patterns in a peaceful context?

In the previous stage, we conceptualized Reddit as a galaxy of tens of thousands of communities and identified four interaction types: Intra-Core, Intra-Periphery, Cross-Strong, and Cross-Weak.

In this section, we move beyond describing the structure itself and ask a more focused question: Once major confounding factors are removed, how does social distance shape language use?

This question seems straightforward but is methodologically delicate. Raw data cannot directly answer it, as they are heavily influenced by covariates. Without proper control, any patterns observed might reflect noise rather than genuine effects. The goal here is not simply to ‚Äúdiscover patterns‚Äù but to systematically calibrate the data and determine which linguistic differences are truly driven by social distance.

üìã Core Terminology

To ensure analytical clarity, we divide interaction contexts into two categories based on the sentiment of links:

  • Peace: Interactions classified as positive or neutral, representing the galaxy‚Äôs steady state.
  • Conflict: Interactions classified as negative, representing periods of instability or disturbance.

First Calibration: Controlling Conflict Rate

The first confounding variable is the uneven distribution of conflict across interaction types.

Conflict is not evenly spread in the Reddit galaxy. Cross-Strong interactions show a much higher frequency of antagonistic language than internal community interactions. By contrast, Intra-Core and Intra-Periphery interactions are generally more restrained. Analyzing all messages together would allow high-conflict language to mask the structural properties of everyday communication.

FIG 2.1

To address this, we divide the corpus into peaceful and conflictual contexts. In this analysis, we focus first on the peaceful context, where language choices reliably reflect communicative expectations and audience perception.

Second Calibration: Controlling Source Clusters

Even within peaceful interactions, a second confound exists: the Source Cluster.

Each cluster in the Reddit galaxy consists of communities with similar topics, norms, and stylistic habits. These inherent preferences influence language. Some clusters favor long sentences, abstract concepts, and extended reasoning; others prefer short, direct, and pragmatic communication. If a specific interaction type is dominated by certain clusters, cluster-specific style could be misattributed to social distance.

To remove this bias, we apply a Linear Mixed-Effects Model (LMM). Each message‚Äôs source cluster is treated as a random effect, absorbing cluster-level stylistic differences. The remaining fixed effects therefore more reliably reflect the influence of interaction type itself. Effectively, the LMM allows us to observe language in the Reddit galaxy after subtracting local cultural coloration.

Language Structure in a Stable Galaxy: Four Dimensions

After both calibrations, we can treat the Reddit galaxy as operating in a stable state. Language now reflects social attributes‚Äô structural influence rather than conflict or cluster culture.

DIMENSION 01
Complexity: Signal Resolution and Information Density
readability avg_words_per_sentence avg_word_length frac_upper
Key observations:
  • Intra-Core: Shows the highest syntactic complexity and longest sentences. Within stable core orbits, users rely on high-resolution signals for dense and precise discussion.
  • Intra-Periphery: Uses shorter sentences with a markedly higher share of capitalization, suggesting a reliance on visual emphasis to compensate for weaker contextual grounding.
  • Cross-Strong: Maintains moderate complexity, balancing clarity and accessibility in cross-cluster communication.
DIMENSION 02
Logical Style: Alignment and Defensive Clarity
LIWC_Funct LIWC_CogMech LIWC_Article LIWC_Prep
Key observations:
  • Cross-Strong: Displays elevated use of function words, articles, and prepositions, reflecting carefully aligned and defensive communication across cultural boundaries.
  • Intra-Cluster: Logical reasoning markers are less explicit, as shared norms allow much of the reasoning to remain implicit.
DIMENSION 03
Identity Expression: Pronouns as Orbital Markers
LIWC_I LIWC_We LIWC_They LIWC_Social
Key observations:
  • Intra-Periphery: Peaks in ‚Äúwe‚Äù usage, indicating stronger boundary reinforcement as peripheral members seek collective validation.
  • Intra-Core: Shows confident and frequent use of ‚ÄúI,‚Äù reflecting internalized identity that requires less explicit group signaling.
  • Cross-community: Increased use of ‚Äúthey,‚Äù marking a clear outward shift in perspective.
DIMENSION 04
Emotional Temperature: Signal Energy Distribution
vader_compound LIWC_Swear LIWC_Affect
Key observations:
  • Intra-Core: Forms a highly stable and positive emotional zone, with strong positive sentiment and minimal profanity.
  • Cross-Strong: Shows restrained emotional variance, reflecting deliberate moderation to maintain cross-cluster stability.
  • Cross-cluster: Retain higher baseline profanity than internal links, indicating persistent friction introduced by social distance.

Four Communication Profiles in the Galaxy

Intra-Core

High readability, implicit logic, elevated LIWC_I, high affect with low anger.
‚Üí Stable Core Orbit

Intra-Periphery

Short sentences, high frac_upper, high LIWC_We and exclusion markers.
‚Üí Near-Core Unstable Belt

Cross-Strong

Moderate complexity, structured defensive grammar, low emotional fluctuation.
‚Üí Stable Interstellar Transfer Path

Cross-Weak

Dispersed features, unstructured communication, rapidly shifting identity.
‚Üí High-Uncertainty Long-Range Traversal

Research Question 03

To what extent does the transition from a peaceful to an conflict context trigger differential linguistic adaptations across distinct link types

If the Reddit galaxy under peaceful conditions revealed an elegant equilibrium shaped by stable orbits, conflict acts as a sudden gravitational disturbance. Using the LMM model on conflict-context data, we observed that antagonism does not merely amplify emotions‚Äîit fundamentally reshapes the structure of signals across the galaxy.

Language Under Disturbance: Four Dimensions of Change

Having established a stable baseline, we now introduce disturbance. By isolating links classified as negative, we observe how language shifts when the Reddit galaxy briefly exits equilibrium. Conflict is rare, but its linguistic signature is sharp.

DIMENSION 01
Complexity: Signal Compression Under Pressure
readability avg_words_per_sentence avg_word_length frac_upper

During conflict, linguistic signals across the galaxy undergo visible compression. Messages become shorter, denser, and less layered.

  • Intra-Core: Previously complex and high-resolution language simplifies, shifting toward direct and assertive statements.
  • Intra-Periphery: Sentences shorten further, while capitalization increases, suggesting visual emphasis compensates for weaker contextual grounding.
  • Cross-Strong: Maintains moderate complexity, preserving readability to prevent misinterpretation across cluster boundaries.

Conflict does not amplify expressive richness; instead, it collapses language into faster, lower-bandwidth signals.

DIMENSION 02
Logical Style: Alignment Versus Assertion
LIWC_Funct LIWC_CogMech LIWC_Certainty

Conflict reshapes how reasoning is expressed, redistributing logical effort across the network.

  • Cross-Strong: High usage of function words and prepositions reflects carefully structured, defensive alignment aimed at minimizing ambiguity.
  • Intra-Core: Increased certainty markers signal assertive, position-driven discourse rather than exploratory reasoning.
  • Intra-Periphery: Reduced cognitive processing words suggest arguments are less elaborated and more emotionally reactive.

Logical clarity survives conflict primarily at inter-cluster bridges, where misunderstanding carries the highest cost.

DIMENSION 03
Identity Mobilization: Pronouns as Defensive Orbits
LIWC_I LIWC_We LIWC_They

Conflict activates identity signals, pulling language into tighter and more polarized orbits.

  • Intra-Core: Sharp increases in ‚ÄúI,‚Äù ‚Äúwe,‚Äù and ‚Äúthey‚Äù indicate that debate transforms into explicit self- and group-defense.
  • Cross-Strong: Elevated ‚Äúthey‚Äù usage keeps attention fixed on external clusters, sustaining inter-group orientation.
  • Intra-Periphery: Pronoun shifts are weaker, suggesting limited capacity for large-scale identity mobilization.

Identity becomes most visible where structural stakes are highest.

DIMENSION 04
Emotional Energy: Local Flares, Not Global Collapse
vader_compound LIWC_Swear LIWC_Anger

Although negative interactions form only a small fraction of total links, their emotional intensity is disproportionate.

  • Intra-Periphery: Swearing and anger spike sharply, reflecting raw, low-regulation emotional release.
  • Intra-Core: Emotional escalation is present but moderated, indicating internal norms still constrain expression.
  • Cross-Strong: Emotional markers remain low, preserving stability at critical inter-cluster bridges.

Conflict manifests as localized flares rather than a system-wide emotional meltdown.

Cross-Context Comparison: From Peaceful Equilibrium to Conflict Shake-Up

Three major shifts emerge when comparing conflict (RQ3) to peaceful (RQ2) galaxy states:

  • Mask Removal:
    Intra-Periphery shifts from restrained to explosive expression; swearing and anger spike, demonstrating that peripheral regions are least bound by social norms.
  • Identity Weaponization:
    Intra-Core intensifies pronoun use; the closest clusters turn conflict into a defense of self and faction.
  • Diplomatic Resilience:
    Cross-Strong links remain the most logical and structured, acting as a stabilizing ‚Äúdiplomatic shield‚Äù in the galaxy.

Conflict-Era Communication Profiles

Intra-Core (Core Defenders)

Higher certainty words and explosive pronoun use ‚Üí Conflict Nature: Identity Defense

Intra-Periphery (Peripheral Outbursts)

Extremely high capitalization and swearing, lower logical markers ‚Üí Conflict Nature: Emotion Release

Cross-Strong (Diplomatic Envoys)

Preserves logic and structure, minimal pronoun volatility ‚Üí Conflict Nature: Rational Debate

Cross-Weak (Occasional Friction)

Dispersed signals, inconsistent structure ‚Üí Conflict Nature: Context Misalignment

Key Insight: The LMM calibration confirms that conflict does not erase social traits‚Äîit amplifies them. Closest clusters fight for identity, the farthest for logic, and peripheral clusters for raw emotion. The galaxy‚Äôs conflict map reveals a gradient from rational negotiation to unfiltered outburst, showing how social distance dictates the form and intensity of conflict in the Reddit galaxy.

Research Question 04

Macro Perspective: Steady-State Structures and Conflict-Driven Reorganization in the Reddit Galaxy

So far, we have analyzed communication links at the micro level, examining signal complexity, logic, identity markers, and emotional tone. However, a galaxy is not defined by individual signals alone‚Äîit is shaped by the interplay of stars and clusters. At the macro level, we face a structural question: What fundamentally defines the social architecture of the Reddit galaxy? When conflicts emerge, does this architecture remain stable, or does it reorganize?

Previous analyses were conducted on the global network, considering both positive and negative interactions together. To test the robustness of the observed structures, we reconstructed the galaxy under two extreme observational lenses: one network containing only positive links (peace network) and another containing only negative links (conflict network).

First, we conducted a short network analysis of these 3 networks.

The network audit reveals that the **Peace** sub-network serves as the galaxy‚Äôs structural anchor, mirroring the **Global** skeleton with near-total connectivity (**99.92% LWCC**). In contrast, the **Conflict** network behaves like a dense nebula; despite its smaller footprint, its density is nearly four times higher, yet it suffers from a sharp drop in reciprocity (**0.0675**) and deeper negative assortativity (**-0.1604**). This confirms that while peace facilitates a stable, mutual dialogue that defines the social order, conflict manifests as concentrated, one-sided "firepower coverage" that triggers structural drift across dissimilar clusters.

Figure 4.1 - Structural Fingerprints: While Peace mirrors the Global skeleton, Conflict exhibits a 4x increase in Density and a crash in Reciprocity (0.0675), indicating targeted, non-mutual aggression.

Our methodology involves the following steps:

  1. Extract text and sentiment labels for each interaction from the raw Reddit data.
  2. Construct two separate networks: a peace network (only positive interactions) and a conflict network (only negative interactions).
  3. Compute 27 language features for each link, including readability, sentence length, pronoun usage, emotional tone, and LIWC categories.
  4. Fit a linear mixed-effects model (LMM) to extract fixed-effect coefficients, producing high-dimensional behavior vectors for each link.
  5. Compare peace and conflict contexts using Pearson correlations, Jaccard similarity, and feature drift analysis to track structural stability and role shifts.
Figure 4.2
Figure 4.3

This approach allows us to track social structures at the ‚Äúgalaxy scale,‚Äù mapping gravitational wells of clusters and observing how conflict perturbs or reshapes these orbits.

1. Initial Hypothesis: ‚ÄúMirror-Constant‚Äù Structures

In the exploratory Phase 0, we observed that positive interactions dominate: roughly 8.35 positive links per negative one. This led to the following hypothesis:

We assume that positive interactions define the Reddit galaxy‚Äôs ‚Äúgravitational skeleton,‚Äù determining which communities occupy the core, which serve as cross-cluster bridges, and which orbit at the periphery. Conflicts may induce local turbulence, but the overall skeletal structure should remain stable.

2. Technical Verification: Peace as the Galaxy‚Äôs Anchor

To test this, we compared the global network with the peace-only network:

  • Computed LMM fixed-effect coefficients for each link, resulting in 27-dimensional high-dimensional behavior vectors.
  • Calculated Pearson correlations between corresponding links in the peace and global networks.
  • Observed near-perfect alignment: peripheral links (Intra-Periphery) reached correlations up to 0.99, with core links similarly aligned.
Figure 4.4

This confirms that positive interactions do not merely dominate in volume‚Äîthey define the steady-state social architecture. Peace acts as the galaxy‚Äôs gravitational anchor, holding core and peripheral clusters in predictable orbits.

3. Structural Drift: Conflict-Induced Logic Shifts

Examining the conflict-only network reveals that the mirror-constant assumption breaks down. Conflict does not just amplify existing patterns‚Äîit generates a new social gravity, reshaping the galaxy‚Äôs landscape.

Figure 4.5

Correlations shrink significantly under conflict, with peripheral regions showing the largest divergence. This indicates that edge clusters are the first to experience destabilization. Conflict warps the underlying social skeleton, producing behaviors unseen under steady conditions.

4. Role Drift & Structural Reorganization

To analyze structural reorganization under conflict, we employed a combination of set theory and statistical comparison:

  • Jaccard Similarity: Measures the overlap of core members between peace and conflict networks, quantifying role retention or migration.
  • Feature Drift Analysis: For nodes ‚Äúrelegated‚Äù from core to periphery, we track shifts in language features (logic, pronouns, emotional tone, readability) before and after migration, testing the hypothesis that high traffic does not guarantee structural influence.
Figure 4.1
Figure 4.2
Relegation

High-traffic core links appear central in global models but lose influence in conflict contexts.

Bubble Effect

Their influence depends on mostly non-negative interactions‚Äîonce conflict appears, the traffic ‚Äúbubble‚Äù bursts.

Reshuffling

In pure conflict, previously peripheral connections rise, demonstrating structural role reshuffling.

5. Conflict vs. Peace: Macro Patterns

Peace Defines the Rules

Positive interactions form the framework for clusters, cores, and bridges, which remains robust under normal conditions.

Conflict Drives Drift

Negative interactions trigger structural drift; peripheral clusters destabilize first, and cross-cluster links may lose authority.

Dynamic Role Shifts

High-traffic core links are strong under peace but vulnerable in conflict due to their reliance on positive interactions.

Reshuffling

Conflict elevates peripheral and opportunistic clusters, challenging the established hierarchy.

Conclusion: The Reddit galaxy is a dynamic equilibrium system. Peace defines the steady-state social order, while conflict drives localized reorganization. Influence under calm conditions does not guarantee influence under pure antagonism‚Äîsocial gravity is context-dependent, and roles can invert quickly.
